greeting.speaker: gnome
greeting.text: Ho there, tall-folk! I am Bramblewick, keeper of the old crafts. Perhaps we can help each other?

choices.text: What do you offer, small friend?
Tell me of the old crafts.

trade_offer.speaker: gnome
trade_offer.text: I have enchanted tools that never dull! For 20 food and 5 mead, they are yours.

choices.text: Too steep a price. Perhaps another time.

trade_complete.speaker: gnome
trade_complete.text: A fine trade! May these tools serve you well in the harsh winters ahead.

lore.speaker: gnome
lore.text: Before your kind built longships, we gnomes walked these lands. We knew the secret songs of iron and stone. Some of us still remember...

farewell.speaker: gnome
farewell.text: Safe travels, tall-folk. May you find your way home before the snow falls.
